resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Allow caches to be stored on more than one list
 · New: Different http libraries for more efficient network communication
 · New: Update of Locus API for improved interworking
 · New: Reworked and simplified authentication screens
 · New: Lists automatically sorted by name, if they contain only similarly named caches
 · New: Online search support for Geocaching.su
 · New: Select between cache and parking place when using navigation for driving
 · New: Show will attend state in cache details, if a matching log is available
 · New: Smileys are now filtered from image list
 · New: Log images shown for OpenCaching caches
 · Changed: Show more text of cache title in lists
 · Removed: No more option to show only short description of a cache
